translation.en: [woman] It's getting closer, but it's not getting any nicer.
[woman] It did not look like this on the internet.
Yeah, I don't remember it being this sausage color.
[young man] Okay, that's the last box, Mum.
Thanks, Jack. I'm gonna take a look at the new shop.
translation.ko: 고마워, 잭 난 가게에 가 보려고

translation.en: How about you ride down, and I'll see you there?
translation.ko: 너도 시내 구경하고 이따 가게에서 만날까?

translation.en: [Jack's mum] Her mum heard we moved into town.
translation.ko: 맨디 엄마가 우리 온 거 들었대

translation.en: [Jack chuckles] Go-karts are for kids, Mum.
I prefer you driving one of those than pulling cupcakes in my car.
translation.ko: 내 차로 컵케이크 하는 것보다 그거 타는 게 백번 낫지

translation.en: -They're called donuts, thank you. -I know what they're called.
-Stop doing them. -I won't even know anyone.
translation.ko: - 아무튼 하지 마 - 난 아는 사람도 없어요

translation.en: That's the point. You'll go to school with these kids once the holidays are over.
translation.ko: 그러니까 가야지 같이 학교 다닐 애들인데

translation.en: Look, here are your choices. You either go to the party,
or you can stay here and help me all afternoon.
You know, because a platypus lays eggs and produces milk,
it's the only animal that can make its own custard.
translation.ko: 자기 거로만 커스터드 만드는 유일한 동물이야

translation.en: Wait. Are you laughing with me or at me?

translation.ko: 그럼 됐어 난 콜린이야, 콜린 파버

translation.en: Jack. Jack Hooper. Nice to meet you.
I'm a bit nervous about driving one of these things.
translation.ko: 난 저런 거 모는 거 좀 떨리더라

translation.en: -I've never done it before. -Neither have I.
translation.ko: - 한 번도 안 해 봤거든 - 나도야

translation.en: But I'm sure it'll be all right.
Come on. Hey, it'll be an adventure.
[Colin] State kart champion. Everyone thinks he'll win Nationals this year.
translation.ko: 카트 주 챔피언 올해엔 국내 챔피언 될 몸이지

translation.en: Remember when I asked you if you were laughing with me or at me?
translation.ko: 내가 비웃는 거냐고 물어본 거 기억나?

translation.en: It was, like, one minute ago.
[Colin] Yeah, well, he and his mates laugh at me.
but I prefer to just ignore them and get on with my day.
translation.ko: 기분 망치기 싫어서 그냥 무시하는 거야

translation.en: Thanks for holding the party here. I appreciate the business.
Have you thought anymore about coaching my boy?
translation.ko: 내 아들 가르치는 건 더 생각해 봤어요?

translation.en: Dean has a real shot at Nationals this year.
All he needs someone with experience to help him get ready.
And you'd make a great asset to our team, Patrick.
translation.ko: 당신이라면 팀 전력에 큰 도움이 될 겁니다

translation.en: Because your boy doesn't have enough talent and...
How long have you been karting?
I don't know. I mean, I slid off.
That's because you went on the outside of the track.
There were marbles on the track?
All the loose bits of dirt and rubber from the tires are swept onto the outside,
translation.ko: 타이어에서 떨어진 흙과 고무가 바깥쪽에 쌓이는데

translation.en: and when you drive over them, they're super slippery.
Yeah, but I prefer to make 'em go faster.
translation.ko: 응, 근데 주로 빨리 가게 만들지

translation.en: Well, they're actually called chief engineers, but yeah.
I want to work in Formula 1 one day.
When you spun off, you nearly took me out.
translation.ko: 너 돌 때 나 칠 뻔했잖아

translation.en: I think you're mad because I almost beat you.
translation.ko: 내가 거의 따라잡아서 화내는 것 같네

translation.en: That's your first and only warning.
He's like a race car guy. Owns a team.
translation.ko: 자동차 레이싱 하셔 개인 팀도 있고

translation.en: -Hip hip... -[all] Hooray! -[Mike] Hip hip... -[all] Hooray! -[Mike] Hip hip... -[all] Hooray!
[Jack] Never gonna beat you, am I, Dad?
After everything that happened in Sydney,
translation.ko: 시드니에서 그 일을 겪고 또 차를 끌고 나가?

translation.en: you take my car again, two days after we get here.
translation.ko: 시드니에서 그 일을 겪고 또 차를 끌고 나가? 여기 온 지 이틀 만에?

translation.en: Mum, I was in the middle of nowhere.
I mean, there was no traffic.
And I'm driving a station wagon.
You were chucking donuts in an empty car park, son.
I apologize, officer. It will not happen again.
translation.ko: 죄송합니다 다신 이런 일 없을 거예요

translation.en: considering there was no harm done,
I'm prepared to let you off with a warning.
If I catch you at it again, you will be in very hot water.
translation.ko: 이런 일로 또 걸리면 뜨거운 맛을 보게 될 거다

translation.en: Well, I should hit the road.
Have you just moved into town?
Yeah, we're taking a lease on a shop on Queen Street.
Well, I might see you around sometime, at some point.
translation.ko: 나중에 한번 기회 되면 또 봐요

translation.en: Well, why do you keep doing it?
I don't know. That's not a good enough reason, mate.
One day, your luck's gonna run out.
I'm hoping that we can build a life here.
You know you can tell me anything.
-Maybe you want to talk to me about Dad-- -Mum, I'm fine.
translation.ko: - 아빠 얘기 하고 싶으면... - 엄마, 나 괜찮아요

translation.en: Look. I got sausage because it matches the color of this house.
translation.ko: 집 색이랑 똑같아서 소시지 넣은 거예요

translation.en: you've been bitten by the racing bug.
Is that when you can't stop thinking about how much of a rush it is?
And you feel like it's what you were put on earth to do?
I reckon you should turn around...
and never speak of it again.
You had one three-lap race in which you spun off and finished last,
translation.ko: 세 바퀴 경주에서도 헛돌고 꼴찌 한 주제에

translation.en: and now you want to make it your life's work?
You know what would be a better idea?
and your parents have, and your friends have...
and buy the nicest boat you can.
Park it in the middle of the harbor...
That'd be a better use of your time and money
than trying to make it as a race driver.
translation.ko: 시간과 돈을 더 유용하게 쓰는 거야

translation.en: Hit the bricks, kid. You don't want this life.
-And your prices are too high. -[flies buzzing]
We don't open for three hours.
I don't have enough money to pay you to drive here.
And when I say enough, I mean any.
I've got an idea that could work for both of us.
translation.ko: 둘 다 안 밑지는 방법이 있어요

translation.en: Clearly, this place needs some TLC.
So employ me to help out, but instead of paying me...
let me drive three laps of the track for every hour I work.
translation.ko: 근무 시간당 세 바퀴씩 타게 해주세요

translation.en: -Three, because the track is short. -One, because of fuel costs.
translation.ko: - 세 바퀴요, 트랙도 짧잖아요 - 한 바퀴, 기름값이 있잖아

translation.en: Three, and didn't you hear what I said about the track being--
One. And I'm not loving this backchat.
-Would have done it for one. -Would have agreed to three.
translation.ko: - 한 바퀴여도 했을 거예요 - 나도 세 바퀴 해주려고 했다

translation.en: All right, you can start now.
When the track gets dusty, it's too slippery to race on.
You're gonna spray it with water to keep it intact.
You want me to spray the whole track using this?
Why don't we use that enormous water truck?
[Patrick] I trust this backchat won't be an ongoing feature of our conversation.
translation.ko: 매번 말대꾸를 들어야 하는 건 아니겠지?

translation.en: Do not enter my caravan without an invitation.
translation.ko: 내 허락 없이 캠핑카에 들어가지 마라

translation.en: Hey. I googled you last night.
It said you used to race cars.
Get to it. You're burning sunlight. Chop chop.
-Is that for me? -Mm-hmm. Oh, thank you.
Oh, well done, you. That's great.
This mean I get to drive?
I can't drive with this thing on.
You've got until sunset to paint the garage with it.
Get to it. You're burning sunlight. Chop chop.
why don't you shove this helmet...
Does this mean I get to drive?
I need you to wash all these.
you're gonna do it with your feet.
You know that's super weird, right?
Get to it. You're burning sunlight. Chop chop.
Can't you offset the top from the center and add more caster?
translation.ko: 중앙에서 위까지 상쇄하고 캐스터를 더 키울까요?

translation.en: but if you tune it right, it's worth at least a tenth of a second a lap.
Really? Is that what you reckon?
If that were true, then why aren't other teams doing it?
translation.ko: 네 말이 맞는다면 왜 다른 팀에선 안 할까?

translation.en: I think we'll stick with what we know.
Leroy wouldn't know a fast kart if it was stapled to--
translation.ko: 그렇게 고정 관념에 사로잡히면 절대 빠른 카트를...

translation.en: Put me in charge of the kart. I'll be a better chief engineer.
translation.ko: 저한테 카트 맡겨주세요 실력 제대로 키울게요

translation.en: Sweetheart, you know it's not that simple.
How am I gonna learn if I never do it?
Maybe you'll get your chance one day.
But right now we all need to focus on our jobs
I need to do some driving, man.
You've got a lot of work to do before you're ready to race.
translation.ko: 레이스 준비하기 전에 할 일이 산더미야

translation.en: Then why am I spraying the track?
translation.ko: 그럼 내가 뭐 하러 물 뿌려요?

translation.en: Or painting the walls with my head?
I need to do some driving.
You'll drive when I say so.
You can't cancel it, it's a deal.
But I will let you drive.
you're gonna take everything inside that shed and put it in the bin.
translation.ko: 창고에 있는 거 싹 갖다 버려

translation.en: I'm gonna turn that into a snack bar.
-You're burning sunlight-- Chop-- -Yeah, sunlight, I know. Chop chop.
Looks like one of the Transformers threw up.
Man, you scared the hell out of me.
Why are you leaping out of shadows?
Of course I couldn't see you!
Can you help me get my kart ready to race at Regionals?
translation.ko: 지역 대회 나갈 건데 카트 만드는 거 도와줄래?

translation.en: [Jack] And I don't have any money.
it could end up costing you money.
translation.ko: 네 돈을 쓰게 될 수도 있어

translation.en: Well, since you put it like that...
Well, I don't know anything about karts. And I don't know anyone who does,
translation.ko: 난 카트도 모르고 카트를 잘 아는 사람도 모르거든

translation.en: So you're asking me because you didn't have any other choices?
translation.ko: 그럼 다른 선택권이 없어서 나한테 부탁하는 거야?

translation.en: And that I think you'd do a good job.
-I'll do it, but with one stipulation. -Okay.
I'm chief engineer. That means I'm in charge of the kart.
translation.ko: 난 수석 엔지니어야 내가 카트를 책임진단 뜻이지

translation.en: [Mandy] You want to race this at Regionals?
It looks like it was hit by a truck.
Was it hit by a truck?
That's the way we found it.
Put the engine parts there, the brake parts there,
translation.ko: 엔진 부품은 저기에 브레이크 부품은 여기에

translation.en: the steering parts here, and the exhaust parts here.
translation.ko: 스티어링 부품은 여기 배기관 부품은 여기

translation.en: Clearly, we need to start from basics.
Okay, listen closely. There'll be an exam afterwards.
translation.ko: 잘 들어, 나중에 시험 볼 거니까

translation.en: Will there really be an exam?
No, Colin. That's the axle. This is the brake disc.
translation.ko: 아니, 저건 차축이고 이건 브레이크 디스크

translation.en: -I'm just happy there isn't an exam. -Yeah.
So where do we test drive it?
Are you sure we're meant to be driving on this?
Sometimes you don't ask for permission, Col.
translation.ko: 항상 허락 맡고 해야 하는 건 아니야

translation.en: You just do it and apologize later.
Now, this is a test drive, so take it slow.
I don't think he heard you.
about that. This was a one-off.
If my dad finds out I helped a rival team...
translation.ko: 내가 상대 팀 도운 거 아빠가 아시면

translation.en: he'll go off like a frog in a sock.
Don't go on the outside of the track like you did at my party.
translation.ko: 내 파티 때처럼 트랙 바깥쪽으로 가지 마

translation.en: If you get on the marbles, you will slide off.
Hey, what if we get you a funnel?
That'd be faster. Then I could just pour it right in there.
translation.ko: 내가 부어주면 더 빨리 먹을 수 있잖아

translation.en: Are you working at that kart place today?
I'll get Colin to FaceTime you.
translation.ko: 콜린이 엄마한테 영상 통화 할 거예요

translation.en: You know you can't let them treat you like that.
I know. I just don't know what to do about it.
translation.ko: 나도 아는데 어떻게 해야 할지 모르겠어

translation.en: No way. I don't want to miss out on an adventure.
title favorite Dean Zeta is in first place!
In second is Jess Hoyt, with Juliet Kay a solid third.
Top three finishers in the upcoming final
move straight through to the State Championships.
[in unison] I attack until I lead. I take no prisoners.
translation.ko: 난 이길 때까지 공격하고 타협이란 없다

translation.en: Whoever said winning isn't everything is a fool who knows nothing.
translation.ko: 승리가 다가 아니라고 한 자는 뭣도 모르는 얼간이다

translation.en: [announcer] This race is in the KA3 class.
the top three finishers go straight through to the State Championship.
translation.ko: 이 경기의 상위 3명은 주 대회에 진출합니다

translation.en: It's my son's first race today.
Okay, here they come, folks, in formation. Two by two.
We're getting set for a start. Green light's on.
Oh! That was a lunge, with a capital L!
Dean Zeta takes the lead, and he's streaking away.
translation.ko: 딘 제타가 선두로 나오며 빠르게 치고 나갑니다

translation.en: And young Hooper now thunders through into tenth place.
He is wearing this go-kart like an old suit!
translation.ko: 고카트와 한 몸이 된 것 같네요

translation.en: Is it safe? Well, they're wearing helmets.
He's going after the champagne, the glory, and the gold!
Come on, Hooper! You can do it, son!
translation.ko: 후퍼, 조금만 더! 할 수 있어요

translation.en: He uses the whole of the track.
He's got his eyes on first place for sure.
-Jack Hooper takes fourth. -Come on, get out of the way!
[Mandy] Don't go on the outside of the track. You will slide off.
translation.ko: 트랙 바깥쪽으로 가지 마 그럼 미끄러져

translation.en: [Patrick] What the hell are you doing?
-Coming third in my first race. -But I told you you weren't ready.
translation.ko: 첫 경주에서 3위 했어요 넌 준비 안 됐다니까

translation.en: Which you just proved by making that reckless overtake.
That overtake got me through to States.
Yeah. It could have put you in a coffin.
I had a lot of help from my mates.
And I... I need help from you too.
-[groans] -When I say coach, I mean teach me everything I need to know about driving.
translation.ko: 운전할 때 알아야 할 모든 걸 가르쳐달란 뜻이에요

translation.en: I don't wanna be doing any more of this spraying
or painting or cleaning with my feet.
All of that was to improve your fitness. All right?
The spraying develops your arms, so they don't get tired when you steer.
translation.ko: 물 뿌리기로 팔 힘을 키워야 조종할 때 지치지 않고

translation.en: The painting strengthens your neck, so you can handle the G-forces when you corner.
translation.ko: 페인트칠로 목을 단련해야 코너 돌 때 관성을 버틸 수 있어

translation.en: The cleaning improves your ankles' flexibility,
so you can work the pedals faster.
This is exactly why I need you to be my coach.
translation.ko: 그래서 제 코치가 돼 달란 거예요

translation.en: I will coach you, but you are gonna do everything I say.
translation.ko: 가르칠 테니까 내가 시키는 건 다 해

translation.en: Oh, those corn are great, by the way. You're gonna love it.
translation.ko: 이 옥수수 진짜 맛있어요 좋아하실 거예요

translation.en: I'm gonna get you to pull over and, uh, turn off your ignition, please.
[Barry] Your mother is going to be very disappointed.
I'm ordering you to stop the vehicle.
What on earth do you think you're doing, mate?
I need you to ask my mother out on a date.
-And why would I want to do that? -Because you like her.
translation.ko: - 내가 왜 그래야 하지? - 엄마를 좋아하시니까요

translation.en: I hope your conversation skills are better than this on the date.
translation.ko: 데이트할 때는 이렇게 안 더듬으실 거죠?

translation.en: There isn't gonna be any date, mate.
-Why not? -What makes you even think I like her?
Ha! See? There it is. That's the type of cheeky banter my mother loves.
translation.ko: 바로 그거예요 우리 엄마 그런 농담 좋아해요

translation.en: Why are you asking me to do this?
You're a cop, so you're probably not a criminal.
And you're not wearing a wedding ring. You are single, right?
And I'm guessing your dad's out of the picture.
So, uh, what do you reckon?
when I talk to women socially,
I have been known to freeze up from time to time.
-Make that all of the time. -Okay, well...
Take a moment to come up with an opening line.
Would you like to go out to dinner with me?
Why do you have an accent all of a sudden?
Okay, let's try it again. One more time, yeah?
Would you like to go out to dinner with me sometime?
Can I help you with anything?
Christie, I was wondering if you'd, uh...
like to go out to dinner with me sometime... next week.
Didn't need to make those changes to the kart after all.
The kart was fast. I won.
If your kart was fast, you would have pulled away.
But you won by half a length.
If you started anywhere but the front, you would have lost.
translation.ko: 선두로 출발 안 했으면 졌을 거야

translation.en: I've been asked out on a date.
I don't know what you did, but... thank you.
I'm sure I have no idea what you're talking about.
You know you don't have to fix everything, right?
You don't always have to be the strong one.
It's okay if you want to, you know...
Backchat. It will also be used as a teaching aid.
Place your hands on the wheel.
The correct position is nine o'clock and three o'clock.
You'll always know which way your front wheels are pointing
if your hands mirror their position on the steering wheel.
When the wheel's turned, a string will be tied on the accelerator.
translation.ko: 바퀴를 돌리면 액셀에 끈이 묶여 있어서

translation.en: You won't be able to press it without snapping it.
it'll start to give you some slack.
I want you to drive as fast as you can.
But you don't snap the string.
You keep your hands at nine and three at all times.
[Patrick] You've got to find that balance between the accelerator and the steering wheel.
Not so easy breezy now, is it? Huh?
Hey. What if the race line is blocked?
I mean, how do I get past?
Well, each situation's different, so there's no right answer.
But I like to apply the rules of the overtake.
analyze what each driver is doing,
and take advantage of any mistake.
Feeling sorry for yourself isn't gonna make you a better driver,
translation.ko: 자기 연민에 빠진다고 실력이 느는 게 아니야

translation.en: it's just gonna make you annoying to be around.
Yeah, but it pisses me off.
it said that you retired from racing in the middle of the season.
She never says hi to us.
Remember your balance here. Take a tighter line.
translation.ko: 여기서 균형 잘 잡고 더 바짝 붙어

translation.en: That's the first time I've seen your teeth.
You've got a long road ahead of you.
You've got to prepare your kart for State. Your friends are gonna help again?
translation.ko: 카트 정비해야 하는데 친구들이 또 도와준대?

translation.en: Is he the one who made it quick?
[Jack] He just found out the engine runs on petrol.
translation.ko: 엔진 원료가 휘발유인 걸 이번에 알았대요

translation.en: We need the one who made it quick.
You did it again. You really couldn't see me?
translation.ko: - 또 간 떨어질 뻔했잖아 - 나 진짜 못 봤어?

translation.en: We've been over this. They're shadows.
I wouldn't have made it through to State without you.
translation.ko: 너 없었으면 주 대회 출전 못 했어

translation.en: I don't know if I want to.
I told you not to go on the outside of the track,
and that's exactly what you did.
The trick is to find a way to unblock it.
I need to know this stuff.
You only say that because you want me to help you.
That doesn't mean it's not true.
I'll take that as a definite maybe.
Is this all your handiwork, Jack?
You're working with Mike Zeta's daughter?
Yeah, and he can't find out I'm doing this.
All in favor of Mandy being chief engineer?
translation.ko: 맨디가 수석 엔지니어가 되는 데 찬성하십니까?

translation.en: You said you wanted the one who made it quick.
I really appreciate you helping me out.
I want to say thank you by...
Yep. [Colin] I'll go see if Patrick needs anything.
I thought it'd be cool to see what you guys do for fun-ness around here.
I'll meet you at the Rollerdrome tomorrow at six.
What the hell are you doing?
I had to drop off your keys.
Right, and somehow break a $150 Thomastik-Infeld D string.
Thing is, I've got a date with your mother tonight.
I've come to realize that I don't know what she likes.
Just give me a second, mate.
I'm just... I'm afraid she's gonna think I'm really boring.
Look, don't talk about yourself too much. Ask questions.
translation.ko: 너무 본인 얘기만 하지 말고 질문을 하세요

translation.en: -Where'd you get all this stuff? -My dad.
Well, he was a very wise man.
I mean, most of the time, you're covered in grease.
You just looked around, saw the Humongous Claw,
That doesn't mean it's not fun.
Hey, do you wanna go and see the new Steve Carell movie tonight?
translation.ko: 스티브 커렐 신작 영화 보러 갈래요?

translation.en: That'd be great. [stammers] It's playing up at the Orana Cinema.
if you wanted to, we could go to the Jade Temple.
Are you singing a Daryl Braithwaite song?
I've never heard of him. Actually, that's not true.
-Why would you do that? -I don't know.
Someone told me that you liked him, so I thought I'd impress you.
translation.ko: 누가 그 가수 좋아한다길래 점수 따고 싶었죠

translation.en: Look, why don't we do something that we'd both like to do?
translation.ko: 우리 둘 다 좋아하는 거 해요

translation.en: So no Steve Carell, no Daryl Braithwaite, no Chinese restaurant,
translation.ko: 스티브 커렐 대릴 브레이스웨이트, 중국 음식

translation.en: no whatever else my son said that I'd like.
Although I'd still like Chinese food. Do you want to do that?
translation.ko: 그래도 중국 음식은 좋은데 먹으러 갈래요?

translation.en: Oh, good. Yeah, I'm dying for a dim sim.
[Mandy] If you finish in the top three and you make it through to Nationals,
it's my first step towards becoming the next Leena Gade.

translation.ko: - 제2의 누구? - 르망 챔피언 차를 정비한

translation.en: She's the first woman to engineer a car that won Le Mans.
translation.ko: - 제2의 누구? - 르망 챔피언 차를 정비한 첫 여자 엔지니어야

translation.en: I want to be her but in Formula 1.
Well, we'd better win then, hey?
[Mandy] My dad and I used to come here when I was little.
translation.ko: 어릴 때 아빠랑 여기 자주 왔는데

translation.en: We haven't been for a while.
Oh, man. And here I am blabbering on.
What was he like? Oh, he loved cars.
[chuckles] We used to drive around on the weekends in his old car.
translation.ko: 주말이면 아빠 낡은 차 타고 드라이브를 했지

translation.en: I'm sorry. This was supposed to be fun.
Actually, this is the most fun-ness I've had in a long time.
translation.ko: 이렇게 재밌게 노는 거 진짜 오랜만이야

translation.en: You know, R2-D2 speaks perfect English in the Star Wars movies,
but all we hear are the beeps,
because he loves to drop the f-bomb so much. [chuckles]
That's my brother and his ass clown mates.
Well, it was fun while it lasted.
So? We work all night and hit Dean where it hurts. On the track.
translation.ko: 그래서? 밤새 고치고 트랙에서 확실히 밟아주면 돼

translation.en: Personally, I'd rather hit him in the nuts, but...
We need a new brake disc. This one is toast.
translation.ko: 새 브레이크 디스크가 필요해 이건 박살 났어

translation.en: [Mandy] My dad won't give me anything if he finds out I'm working with a rival team.
translation.ko: 내가 상대 팀 돕는 거 아시면 아빠는 절대 안 주셔

translation.en: Look, I'm sure you'll do great in prison,
but my delicate constitution isn't suited to a life behind bars.
translation.ko: 난 허약 체질이라 감옥에서 못 살아

translation.en: [Mandy] No one's going to prison, Colin.
We're just gonna fix what they destroyed.
translation.ko: 우린 놈들이 망친 걸 고치는 것뿐이야

translation.en: Now, keep your balaclavas on. There's cameras everywhere.
So if anyone approaches the building, you have to let us know.
[Colin] All right. If I see anyone coming, I'll make a bird sound like...
[Colin] All right, Colin. You got this.
[Ted laughs snidely] I'll bet you're last! [Dean] Here comes the ankle tap! Oh!
translation.ko: - 무조건 네가 꼴찌야 - 내 태클을 받아라!

translation.en: -[Ted] Dean, tell us the code. -[Dean] You're dreaming.
Fire up the PlayStation. I'll get some drinks.
-Shotgun player one! -You're always player one. It's my turn.
translation.ko: - 나 1번 플레이어 할래 - 이번엔 내 차례야

translation.en: [Ted] I'm player one. I'm the best.
[Ralph] Hey, Dean. Get me a lemonade.
[Ralph] Ralph, three. Ted, nothing. You ain't gonna stop me.
-'Cause I'm the best! -[Dean] Coming right up.
That's the lamest thing you've ever said.
translation.ko: 네가 한 말 중에 제일 진부해

translation.en: It's amazing you don't get heartburn.
Ah, it's all right. I'll just get Colin to FaceTime you.
translation.ko: 괜찮아요, 콜린한테 영상 통화 하라고 할게요

translation.en: I like to call it FT.
-Don't do that scary sliding thing. -Don't worry, Mum.
translation.ko: - 무서운 슬라이딩은 하지 마 - 걱정 말아요

translation.en: [woman] You're clearly favorite to take the Under-16 State Championship.
translation.ko: 16세 이하 주 대회의 강력한 우승 후보인데

translation.en: Are you confident of a win?
Yes, well, of course I would love to win State this year.
But, at this point in time, I'm just taking it one day after the next.
[Jack] Let me give you a tip.
Everybody takes it one day after the next.
See you at the finish line.
Mate, you've got to stand up to him, okay?
Hi. I'm here to register for the Under-16s.
and title favorite Dean Zeta is in first place.
You're gonna be a lot faster with some new tires on.
It's a good thing I brought a set then, isn't it?
Remember the rules of the overtake.
Analyze what the other drivers are doing.

translation.ko: 그리고 아무도 안 보는 것처럼 춤춰라

translation.en: Aren't you gonna give me a motivational speech?
I mean something rousingly inspirational about never giving up,
translation.ko: 막 투지가 샘솟게 하는 말요 절대 포기하지 말라든가

translation.en: and doing your best, and the eye of the tiger and all that?
I mean, I could do all that. It would feel a bit forced now.
translation.ko: 뭐, 할 수는 있지 좀 억지 느낌은 있지만

translation.en: I mean, that stuff's got to be spontaneous.
[in unison] I attack until I lead. I take no prisoners. I never concede.
translation.ko: 난 이길 때까지 공격하고 타협도, 양보도 없다

translation.en: Whoever said winning isn't everything is a fool who knows nothing.
translation.ko: 승리가 다가 아니라고 한 자는 뭣도 모르는 얼간이다

translation.en: let's see how fast you really are.
the top three finishers will advance to the National finals.
Dean Zeta leads with daylight second.
They're traveling at 100 km an hour a few millimeters above the ground.
translation.ko: 지면에서 약간 뜬 상태로 시속 100km로 달립니다

translation.en: You make your own luck in a kart.
And Jack Hooper slices through the field.
Jack Hooper has a monster lunge down the back straight
translation.ko: 잭 후퍼가 무서운 기세로 치고 나오며

translation.en: [announcer] Storming performance from the new boy from Busselton.
He's hugging the inside of the track like it's his favorite granny.
translation.ko: 할머니 품인 양 안쪽 트랙을 꽉 끌어안고 있네요

translation.en: Remember the rules of the overtake.
Analyze what the other drivers are doing.
The top three can cruise home from here, and they'll be through to the Nationals.
Hooper throws one up the inside and steals it.
[Jack] I'm coming for you, dude man.
A beautifully-constructed pass, but also completely unnecessary.
translation.ko: 아주 유려한 추월이었지만 전혀 의미 없는 추월이었죠

translation.en: Hooper didn't get the memo about holding positions.
translation.ko: 후퍼는 자리를 지키란 메모를 못 받았나 봅니다

translation.en: Hooper tries to dive for first.
-[Jack's dad] Show no fear. -[Mandy] Don't go on the outside.
translation.ko: - 두려움을 보이지 마 - 트랙 바깥쪽으로 가지 마
- 인내심을 가져 - 난 절대 안 져

translation.en: [Patrick] I told you you weren't ready.
[Mandy] Get on the marbles, you will slide off.
Jack Hooper finished fourth and backwards over the finishing line.
You were second and we were on our way to Nationals,
translation.ko: 넌 2위였어 전국 대회가 코앞이었는데 네 발로 차버렸지

translation.en: and instead you threw it away
translation.ko: 전국 대회가 코앞이었는데 네 발로 차버렸지

translation.en: by making a reckless move that wasted all our time and effort.
translation.ko: 네 무모함이 우리의 시간과 노력을 물거품으로 만들었어

translation.en: I just had to beat him.
And you didn't even qualify, so you could beat him when it counted.
You put yourself ahead of the team,
and I can't be with someone who does that.
translation.ko: 난 그런 사람과 일 못 해

translation.en: Looks like you backed the wrong horse, mate.
Come on. Help us load this in.
Come on. We're doing this for you. Chop chop.
translation.ko: 너 대신 일하는 거 안 보여? 잽싸게 와!

translation.en: you'd still be in that caravan hiding from the world,
translation.ko: 코치님은 여전히 세상을 피해 캠핑카에 숨어 있었겠죠

translation.en: You know, that was a bit harsh.
-I saw the accident. -Don't want to talk about it.
-Well, I do. -Don't want to talk about it, Mum.
-I don't think you should race anymore. -You don't have to worry about it!
translation.ko: - 이젠 경주 그만해 - 그건 걱정 마세요

translation.en: I didn't make it through to Nationals!
[Jack's dad] Look after your mum when I'm gone, mate.
-♪ I found notes that you hid ♪ -Jack!
-[Christie] That's it, there. There. -[Barry] All right.
Jack, you've got to talk to me.
Why do you keep doing this?
Me and Dad used to do them when we drove around.
So I take your car out and for a little while, I just...
translation.ko: 그래서 엄마 차를 갖고 나오면 잠시나마...

translation.en: it's like he's... with me again.
And I don't know how to fix it.
Some things you just can't fix.
But this pain that you feel...
I mean, it's already happening, and I don't want it to.
I don't want to forget him.
Oh, we won't let that happen.
Just let it out. You'll feel better.
Yeah, well, Dad said blokes only get three cries in life.
translation.ko: 아빠가 남자는 딱 세 번만 우는 거랬어요

translation.en: And if I have to choose between this
until you lose it and steal my car again...
translation.ko: 또 내 차를 훔치는 것 중 택하라면

translation.en: Mate, I know you're there. I can see your curtains twitching.
translation.ko: 거기 있는 거 알아 커튼 움직이는 거 다 보여

translation.en: I know what I said was terrible, and I'm an idiot.
translation.ko: 내가 진짜 못 할 말 했고 내가 바보였어

translation.en: And I don't deserve you as my bestie.
The driver who came second at State had an illegal carburetor.
And I've been promoted to third.
And I can race at Nationals.
I managed to piss off everyone on my team,
and you don't want me to do it anyway.
Well, if it's something that you really love...
I guess I'll just have to be brave.
Just get your team back together.
You know, girls kind of like it when you apologize.
Heard you lucked through to Nationals.
And that means you're gonna need to fix your kart.
And I'm not gonna let you steal any more of our parts.
You do need to be punished for the last time you robbed us.
-Standing up to them. Showing no fear. -I love it!
-Does it mean you accept my apology? -Yeah, but don't do it again.
translation.ko: - 내 사과 받아주는 거야? - 또 그러면 죽는다

translation.en: I shouldn't have said what I said.
I was upset, and I took it out on you.
And I hope you can forgive me.
because you did get me out of the caravan.
You want to get out one more time?
The driver who came second at State was disqualified.
we're going to Nationals in his place.
And I can't go through something like that again.
Look, I'm trying to push it to the limit.
You don't want to be fearless.
You don't want that. Fear is good.
Fear tells you when you push too far.
Doesn't it separate the winners from everyone else?
translation.ko: 그게 승자와 나머지를 구분 짓는 거 아니에요?

translation.en: No. It separates the dead men from those that get to go home.
translation.ko: 아니, 저승으로 갈 자와 집으로 갈 자를 구분 짓지

translation.en: It's why I was reluctant to help you in the first place.
translation.ko: 그래서 애초에 널 돕는 걸 망설인 거다

translation.en: Because, honestly, when I saw you racing for the first time,
translation.ko: 솔직히 처음 네가 달리는 걸 봤을 때

translation.en: it was like I was watching myself.
And I thought I could help you avoid some of the mistakes that I've made.
translation.ko: 내가 한 실수를 안 하게 도와주고 싶었어

translation.en: We were racing. I was behind my teammate, and I...
translation.ko: 같이 경기에 나갔지 난 팀 동료 뒤에 있었고...

translation.en: tried an overtake which was risky, stupid.
And we clipped, and I sent him into the wall.
translation.ko: 우린 부딪쳤고 그 친구는 벽으로 날아갔지

translation.en: Was it the guy in the photo?
Trying to be fearless on the track, I ended up killing...
translation.ko: 트랙에서 겁 없이 굴다가 사람을 죽였다

translation.en: a man who was very important to me.
So, honestly, I don't think I'm the right man to be teaching you--
translation.ko: 그래서 난 널 가르칠 만한 사람이 아니야

translation.en: Let me show you at Nationals.
But you've taught me a lot.
Let me show you at Nationals.
What was the first thing I ever told you?
The stuff about sinking the boat?
That I don't want a life in motor racing?
Come on. We've got a kart to fix.
See how you've been muscled wide by that kid?
You need to be more aggressive defending your position.
[woman on TV] ...come from all around the region.
Loads of talent from all the young kids.
I want to throw it to the principal and the band master
to tell us about what sort of music they're gonna play.
translation.ko: 아이들의 연주를 듣고 뭐라고 할지 궁금하네요

translation.en: Who are you, and what have you done with my son?
translation.ko: 넌 누구야? 내 아들한테 무슨 짓을 한 거야?

translation.en: [chuckles] See? I do listen to you.
translation.ko: 봤죠? 나 엄마 말 잘 들어요

translation.en: -Wish me luck. -Luck. I'll see you there.
Rounding up the qualifying session from the KA3
and it's nationals title favorite Dean Zeta sitting on pole position.
translation.ko: 강력한 우승 후보 딘 제타가 선두를 차지하네요

translation.en: My steering was all over the shop.
I've got no idea what that is.
I know I was handed the keys to the...
and dropped them in the moat.
What I'm trying to say is...
I'm sorry for what I did.
If I could go back and change it...
You think adding that second please
will make the difference between me saying yes or no?
[announcer] With water on the track, there won't be much grip,
so we'll see the karts slip and slide around the corners tonight.
It should make for an epic race.
So keeps missing the apexes, right?
It looked like he was driving a box of cats.
We've got 20 minutes till the race.
Of course I can. It's me.
What do you think you're doing?
I'm chief engineer of this kart.
What did you think I was gonna do?
Wait around, sorting bolts for people who don't appreciate me?
translation.ko: 날 무시하는 사람들 밑에서 볼트나 정리할 줄 알았어요?

translation.en: You never let me work on the kart. We built this using my ideas.
translation.ko: 카트엔 손도 못 대게 하시죠 이건 제 아이디어로 만들었어요

translation.en: It cost one tenth of yours, and it's quick enough to beat it.
translation.ko: 비용은 아빠네 10분의 1이지만 속도는 절대 안 밀려요

translation.en: I'm not discussing this in front of strangers.
translation.ko: 모르는 사람들 앞에서 이런 얘기하기 싫다

translation.en: "They're not strangers, Dad. They're my team."
Thank you. Now let's fix this kart and win this thing, yeah?
Whoever said winning isn't everything is a fool who knows nothing.
translation.ko: 승리가 다가 아니라고 한 자는 뭣도 모르는 얼간이다

translation.en: [announcer] Last call for entrants for the KA3 final.
You're required in the marshaling area immediately.
I'll try not to be, but I...
Yeah, it's called the red mist. Keep it open.
Yeah. It happens to a lot of people.
Believe me, if you want to have any success on the track
you're gonna have to learn how to control it.
the only thing that ever worked for me...
Sometimes the simple things work best.
So are you gonna give me the motivational speech?
we've established that's not my strong suit, all right, but...
Go on, get to it. You're burning...
The last race of the night is the KA3 class final.
translation.ko: 오늘 밤 마지막 경기는 KA3 클래스 결승입니다

translation.en: A 20-lapper, at the end of which, we'll have a new national champion.
translation.ko: 스무 바퀴를 다 돌면 새 국내 챔피언이 탄생합니다

translation.en: Welcome to our television viewers as we go live around Australia.
Dean Zeta leads by two kart lengths. He looks like the man to beat tonight.
translation.ko: 딘 제타가 두 카트 차로 앞섭니다 우승에 성큼 다가서네요

translation.en: -Come on. -Come on, you've got this, Dean.
translation.ko: - 더 빨리 - 넌 할 수 있어, 딘

translation.en: Back in the pack and the elbows are out.
Jack Hooper fires one up the inside
A monster lunge by Hooper and he grabs another place!
translation.ko: 후퍼가 무섭게 질주하며 또 한 명을 제칩니다

translation.en: Dean Zeta, showing all of his experience, and he skips away at the front.
translation.ko: 딘 제타는 노련함을 뽐내며 빠르게 달아나네요

translation.en: Hooper threads the needle through turn three
Analyze what the other drivers are doing.
Hooper gets a run and throws one down the inside.
translation.ko: 후퍼가 안쪽 주자를 따돌리고 앞으로 치고 나갑니다

translation.en: Hooper looks the only driver capable of challenging Zeta.
translation.ko: 제타의 적수는 후퍼밖에 없는 것 같네요

translation.en: Hooper thought about it, but Zeta-- Ooh! Slams the door. There was no way past.
translation.ko: 후퍼가 기회를 노려 보지만 제타가 문단속을 철저히 하네요

translation.en: You have to learn how to control it.

translation.ko: 콜린 파버야 모험을 놓칠 순 없지

translation.en: -I don't want to miss out on an adventure. -Two.
translation.ko: 콜린 파버야 모험을 놓칠 순 없지 둘

translation.en: [announcer] Zeta and Hooper, first and second on the road.
This is dangerous. There's absolutely no grip out there.
Hooper cuts up the inside and slingshots out of the final corner!
translation.ko: 후퍼가 안쪽으로 파고들며 마지막 코너로 질주합니다

translation.en: Jack Hooper is your new national champion.
What a drive. What a mega race.
That was Australian motorsport at its finest.
Dean Zeta finished second. Jack Kagan was third,
-I couldn't have done it without you. -I know.
translation.ko: - 너 아니었으면 못 했을 거야 - 알아

translation.en: Did you count back from five?
I'm, uh... I'm gonna give Patrick a hand.
[announcer] Ladies and gentlemen, please join us for the presentation ceremony.
